titles.title: Sweet Peace, the Gift of God's Love

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There comes to my heart one sweet strain, A glad and a joyous refrain; I sing it again and again, Sweet peace, the gift of God’s love.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Peace, peace, sweet peace! Wonderful gift from above! O wonderful, wonderful peace! Sweet peace, the gift of God’s love!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thro' Christ on the cross peace was made, My debt by His death was all paid; No other foundation is laid For peace, the gift of God’s love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When Jesus as Lord I had crowned, My heart with this peace did abound; In Him the rich blessing I found-- Sweet peace, the gift of God’s love.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: In Jesus for peace I abide, And as I keep close to His side, There’s nothing but peace doth betide, Sweet peace, the gift of God’s love.
